item.title: Learn the natverse
item.description: See how the natverse makes analysing neuroanatomical data easier with R. Read it online, or try another resource from the community.
item.content: See how the natverse makes analysing neuroanatomical data easier with R. Read it online, or try another resource from the community.

item.title: Need help?
item.description: First learn how to make a reprex then share it with others.
item.content: First learn how to make a reprex then share it with others.

item.title: R packages for neuroanatomical data
item.description: The natverse is a collection of R packages designed for analysing neuroanatomical data. All packages help users import, analyse and visualise neuroanatomical data across species ranging from fruit-flies to mice. Install the complete natverse with: devtools::install_github("natverse/natverse")
item.content:
The natverse is a collection of R packages designed for analysing neuroanatomical data. All packages help users import, analyse and visualise neuroanatomical data across species ranging from fruit-flies to mice.

Install the complete natverse with:

devtools::install_github("natverse/natverse")
